title: Looking for team members for open ladder
body:
Me and a couple friends have decided to start a team to compete in the open ladder.  I'm looking for people who can put the time and effort into participating. Preferred if you have Raidcall (VoIP). If you're interested post a response in this thread with the following:
- In-game name (if different from boards)
- Preferred role
- Roles you can play
- Availability (days of the week, hours/day, approximations fine)
- Which, if any, VoIP you have.

Current members:
- SparksElm (ADC main)
- Denrobe (Support main)
- paidpro (Top main)

Need:
- Mid main
- Jungle main

Please note we may end up playing some normals with candidates to better understand each individuals play style.

replies.body:
hey guys keen to join ur team main udyr jg 
IGN: TheSeventhSon86
i also have access to a ts3 client (my clans ts3) and have curse and skype add me for a tryout

We have come to an agreement for who to offer which positions. Unfortunately we were unable to play trial games with everyone as circumstances weren't as giving as I had hoped and I apologise to those we didn't get around to. Those who we are offering positions are as follows:
Mid: SupremeKiller
Jungle: Unholy Angel
Sub: TBL Creamie
Those who are being offered positions can reply via this thread or in-client pm.
Hey I am still looking to join the team just feel free to add me.
Cool. Will send you the invite when I log on next.

- In-game name : Deep Sanity
- Preferred role : Top, Mid, JG
- Roles you can play : all lanes and jg
- Availability : all day of the week (but not on the 6th i'm travelling but will be still able to play)
- Skype, can get any others
- i am bronze V but i don't play like bronze

you can add me as a back up, if i don't get in the team

- Thanks Deep Sanity

heartvine, you know me! and you KNOW i should be in the team, 100%.

i will be your jungler. and ADC sub.

> heartvine, you know me!

Which is exactly why you're not part of the team.

But seriously (and if you are serious) you'll need to apply like everyone else.
Just wondering, why do you never post from sparkelm?
It got a forum ban...
hm, you didnt seem like the type to get banned

Hi, my name is Nick. I am a gold jungle main that is looking for some solid team mates. 

- Mr Scientist
- Prefer Jungle but I can also do mid. 
- I have raidcall and teamspeak.

In the jungle I usually main J4 for his versatility, Yi for cheap carrying and warwick for fun. I used to do a mean J4/sejuani tank build but with the new changes RIP spirit of the ancient golem. 

Add me for a game of normals when I am online, the preason jungle changes are pretty big so I will be practicing whenever I'm free. I work on call so my availability fluctuates but I am on holidays at the moment.

In-game name - **Sugar13** (same as login name)
- Preferred role - **Jungle**
- Roles you can play - **Jungle, Support and Top**
- Availability - **Most days in the evening I am available (normally play solo queue each night for a few hours).**
- Which, if any, VoIP you have. - Skype, Curse Voice (can get any VoIP that is required).

I am currently in Bronze 2. Been playing for 2 years. I have a lot of experience in traditional sport team environments, I am 43 years old so I am calm, measured and reliable. :)

Willing to have any number of trial games or talk in person if you want to know more. I can assure you I will give my best to do well and will work with team members to ensure we have a positive experience whether we win or lose.

DRAbsol
Jungle
Mid
Weekends and Afternoons on week days preferably 3:00Pm
Skype

ign: best player world

I prefer the mid lane or i afk 

if i dnt make the teem u all suk
We can all suck together.

IGN: SupremeKiller
Preferred Role: Mid
Roles I can play are basically any but I prefer not to duo lane.
Availability: Most days of the week just send me a message, if I am not on League then just call me on skype etc.
I have got Skype but am willing to get any other voice chat software.
Please message me in league if you are thinking about considering me into the team so we can get everything sorted out, thanks.

IGN: FLamecannon
Preferred Role: Jungle
Roles you can play: Mid/Jung/ADC
Availibilty: Pretty much all days of the week, 4-10-11pm + All weekend except 12:30-2 on Sunday.
VoIP: Skype, Vent, TS, Curse Voice.

IGN: BigMos
Preffered Role: Jungle
Availability: Most Weekdays after 6pm till 11:30pm and Most of the Weekend except early Saturday morning until 1pm
VoIP: I have Skype and can install other communication services if needed
Have been told I play at a Gold level usually

IGN: Dyrilby
Age: 19
Roles: ex-jungle main, still good at it
Availability: I'm able to get on at most any time, bar going out with some mates or some other event
VoIP: already have Raidcall installed, also have Skype, Curse Voice, Teamspeak and Ventrillo.

Just to let everyone know, I've sent out friend requests on my main (SparksElm, as above) to make it easier to communicate if needed and also to make it easier should we want to play some trial games with you.

IGN: HW Chungis
Age: 16, turning 17 early next year.
Roles: I focus solely on mid lane.
Availability: I'm going to be working a little over the holidays but for the most part I'm free.
VoIP: I have skype, willing to get any others.
Gold 5 Soloq. Have been part of a gold 1 ranked team. Main mid. Can play all roles. 16 years old. Can play all champs. Test me out because words don't mean much.

Hello, i'm very interested in joining the Team. I am a great team player and can adapt to any role that is put upon me although i am currently Bronze 2 i have recently deranked a lot... I would like to have a trial and you can see if i have the skill for this team. Thankyou ***LegendAzz***

IGN: LegendAzz
Age: 15 turning 16 in 3 months.
Role Applying: Where you put me boss.
Best Champs: Akali/Poppy/Lucian/Vayne/Corki and have a nice fetish for Nasus as i am fairly decent at stacking.
Experience In Teams: I have played quiet a lot of Ranked games and Ranked teams although i havn't been as successful as i wish i think i deserve a shot too see if you guys like my playing style and see if im good enough i have a Mic/Headset skype. I can play quiet a lot due to myself being on holidays right now.
Thankyou AzZ. :)
I'll put you on the list.
What rank r u guys atm?
I'm Silver 3, Denrobe is high Bronze and paidpro is unranked though probably at a silver level.
Okay add me LegendAzz ill be on soon
Hello there, is there any more space left? Not sure if it is updated

If so, I would like to join.
IGM : Leonny890
Roles preferred : Welp, there is only jungle and mid left.
Available usually on at 4-6pm from mondays to fridays and free on all-time saturday/sundays.
Have skype and can use other communication methods if you want to.
Don't worry, final decisions probably aren't going to be for a few days (I'd estimate Sunday night or Monday). Will add you to the list.

- In-game name - JordzIzBeast
- Preferred role - Mid/JG
- Roles you can play - Mid/JG/Top
- Availability (days of the week, hours/day, approximations fine) - Available all days
Im just looking to play with some nice chilled out guys who want to play for fun but also to progess as players and get better as a team together!
I can play mid, top and support and am gold 3 atm.

Hey im keen to join team for open ladder.
I can play pretty much any role.
have quite abit of champs and can play multiple champs in each role.
Summoner name is: Unholy Angel.
currently ranked at S2.
let me know if your interested in me.
Thanks
I also have a mate who Jungles, his name is Kradain, he told me he wants to try out
Cool. Think you could get him to post here with some details?
Yeah I'll get him to, would you mind if I PMed you my details/availabilities?
That'll be fine.

TBL Creamie
Mid,adc main 
i can play all roles to some extent but support is my worst as it is my least played
i am avaliable at all time during the week apart from tuesday 6pm till about 8 and friday 7ish till about 9
Curse, Raidcall, Skype


Message me whenever i will most likely be on
Cool. Will add you to the list. Do you have any VoIP programs?
Ok. Would you be willing to get Raidcall? (I ask because it's what we are currently using)
Is there any restriction with SoloQ rank?
Nope (I'm Sparks by the way).
Would it be fine if I tried for Mid?
I'm cool with that. Need a mid.
Sweet as, thanks for this opportunity

So, other than mid, what roles can you play? (If you do get in you'll be playing Mid mostly but we may switch around on occasion)
Also, got any VoIP programs?
I can play ADC, Support and Top quite decently,  and yeah I have Skype and Raidcall
